tag_list: web, technology, entrepreneur, father, husband, business-owner
overview:
Jeremy R DeYoung, CEO of LunarFly, LLC, is a serial business entrepreneur and one of the brightest minds in the country. Since 1997, Jeremy has created forty-one unique products and services; bringing them to market within unique seven industries. While most of the concepts are in the technology, he is quickly expanding into many other areas such as retail and wholesale markets.

He spends the majority of his day educating, equipping, and empowering select clients throughout the United States. And when he is not working with clients, he is busy creating new products & ideas, reading, and spending time with his lovely wife Jessica and his two sons’ Noah & Carter.
